mapper.insert: insert into chinadaylist (date, today_confirm, today_suspect, today_heal, today_dead, today_severe, today_storeConfirm, today_input, total_confirm, total_suspect, total_heal, total_dead, total_severe, total_input, total_storeConfirm) values (#{date}, #{todayConfirm}, #{todaySuspect}, #{todayHeal}, #{todayDead}, #{todaySevere}, #{todayStoreConfirm}, #{todayInput}, #{totalConfirm}, #{totalSuspect}, #{totalHeal}, #{totalDead}, #{totalSevere}, #{totalInput}, #{totalStoreConfirm})
